site.title: Ninja Path | Free URL shortener
site.description: Ninja Path it's a free URL shortener. You can make your own URLs in just one click.

index.toast-error-description-two: Alias must be between 2 and 20 characters.
index.toast-error-description-three: Alias already in use. Try with other one.
index.toast-error-description-four: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
